typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employedata
source(output(
		depid as string,
		depname as string,
		Prop_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdata
ModifyColumns1, deptdata join(department == depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpDeptDatda
employedata derive(country = upper(country)) ~> ModifyColumns1
JoinEmpDeptDatda sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empdeptDS'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname = name,
		country,
		depname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputDATa
